Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Character
      BattleCharacter
          Player

public class Player
extends BattleCharacter

The player class extends BattleCharacter. Introduces coins.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns message of the Player stating name and statistics HP = health, ATT = maximum attack power, DEF = defense EX. Aang | Airbender | HP: 53 | ATT: 32 | DEF: 45 | COINS: 100 |
